Title: An Expression
Description: ['Symbolized an urban man with a triangle figure, a country woman with a circle, and represented the encounter between the two by movement.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Director Shigenji Ogino tried to naturally color the movie via the ', kinema color, " technique. Due to being an early work, the technique isn't smooth. Because of this the film has a photosensitive epileptic seizure warning as there are high frequency flashes of red and green frames for the duration of the entire film. ", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Please be careful while viewing.']
